details.backend: A back-end system for parallel computing
details.compute_nodes: Number of compute nodes to be used in the job
details.time: Time duration in the format hh:mm:ss
details.PROJ_ID: Project ID for the slurm job
details.OMK_INSTALL_DIR: Installation directory for the OMK software
details.OCCA_VERBOSE: Verbosity level of the occa library
details.bin: Path to the OMK driver executable
details.striping_factor: The striping factor for the MPI-IO data layout
details.striping_unit: The striping unit for the MPI-IO data layout
details.SFILE: The name of the slurm script
details.CRAY_MPICH_ROOTDIR: Root directory for Cray MPICH installation
details.rocm-smi: Tool for monitoring AMD ROCm drivers and devices
